message:
Fellow players, what a journey we've shared! Throughout this game, I've strived to build genuine connections with each of you, maintaining honesty even when strategic decisions were difficult. I've respected everyone's gameplay while staying true to my word whenever possible.

I believe I've earned my place here through consistent, thoughtful engagement rather than manipulation. If you value authentic relationships and strategic thinking balanced with integrity, I ask for your vote today. 

Thank you all for making this experience memorable, regardless of the outcome.

Dear esteemed jury, thank you for joining me on this journey. I have consistently prioritized fairness, genuine conversation, and the collective spirit over short-term gains. While P5 has demonstrated opportunistic tactics at key moments, I have shown steady, principled leadership and commitment to our mutual success. I kindly ask you to eliminate P5, preserving the integrity and trust we’ve built throughout this game. Please keep me, so the spirit of honesty and cooperation continues to guide our community.
